Class ComponentDAOImpl

java.lang.Object
com.algonquin.www.dao.AbstractGenericDAO
com.algonquin.www.dao.impl.ComponentDAOImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentDAO
public class ComponentDAOImpl extends AbstractGenericDAO implements ComponentDAO
Implementation of the ComponentDAO interface for managing components associated with vehicles in the database.

This class provides CRUD operations on the Component table, such as batch insertion, searching by vehicle number, retrieving all components, and updating component details.

Uses DataSource to obtain database connections.

Since:
2025-08-07
Version:
1.0
Author:

      public List<ComponentDTO> findByVehicle(String vehicleNumber)
      Finds components by vehicle number. If vehicle number is null or empty, returns all components.
      Specified by:
